content.text: Match ends, Almería 4, Ponferradina 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 4, Ponferradina 1.
Offside, Ponferradina. Wellington Silva tries a through ball, but Máyor is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Wellington Silva (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Saúl following a corner.
Corner,  Ponferradina. Conceded by Esteban.
Attempt saved. Javier Carpio (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Juande.
Attempt missed. Iago Falque (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Carlos Calvo.
Attempt blocked. Rubén Suárez (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Carlos Calvo.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Alan Baró.
Attempt saved. Saúl (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wellington Silva.
Corner,  Ponferradina. Conceded by Esteban.
Attempt saved. Saúl (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

Carlos Calvo (Almería) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Almería. Rubén Suárez replaces Fernando Soriano.
Attempt missed. Fernando Soriano (Almería) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Verza.
Attempt missed. Carlos Ruiz (Ponferradina) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Saúl following a set piece situation.

Foul by Christian Fernández (Almería).
Iván Moreno (Ponferradina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Saúl (Ponferradina) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Goal!  Almería 4, Ponferradina 1. Iago Falque (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Charles following a fast break.

Substitution, Ponferradina. Yuri replaces Ander Lafuente.
Goal!  Almería 3, Ponferradina 1. Fernando Soriano (Almería) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan with a cross.
Attempt saved. Fernando Soriano (Almería) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Iago Falque.
